name: 3LM
description: A game consisting of 5 maps at the moment, the first map is a 5 level route with an enemy. At level 4 most players will not have enough to do so I will explain it to you, you must find a letter hidden in a super market then when you find them, click on the letter "E" on your keyboard. The second map is also a 3 level troll trail game. The third map is a hide and seek game where you have to find a blue ball to hide in a random place, and you can change characters with the up arrow.In the 4th map you have to finish each level with a limited time , if you are in level 2 or higher when the time limit expires you will start over from level 1.
